story.text: Jan 2 Auto parts maker Accuride Corp. (ACW.N) named Chief Executive Terrence Keating to the additional position of chairman. Keating succeeds James Greene, who will remain on the board as an independent director, the company said in a statement. The company also named General Counsel David Armstrong to the additional position of chief financial officer. He succeeds John Murphy, the current chief financial officer, who will now become its chief operating officer. (Reporting by Sankalp Saini in Bangalore)
story.title: accuride names ceo to additional position of chairman
